args.name: SPEECH
options: I have spoken.
"I have spoken."
Bounty hunting is a complicated profession.
"Bounty hunting is a complicated profession."
I will initiate self-destruct.
"I will initiate self-destruct."
This is the way.
"This is the way."
People get built different. We don’t need to figure it out, we just need to respect it.
"People get built different. We don’t need to figure it out, we just need to respect it."
You don’t need a mirror to look good. You’re beautiful on the inside.
"You don’t need a mirror to look good. You’re beautiful on the inside."
Sometimes life is scary and dark. That is why we must find the light.
"Sometimes life is scary and dark. That is why we must find the light."
Everything small is just a smaller version of something big.
"Everything small is just a smaller version of something big."
Suckin’ at something is the first step to being sorta good at something.
"Suckin’ at something is the first step to being sorta good at something."
Life happens wherever you are, whether you make it or not.
"Life happens wherever you are, whether you make it or not."
You can’t knock me down!
"You can’t knock me down!"
Roar!
"Roar!"
My first girlfriend turned into the moon.
"My first girlfriend turned into the moon."
True humility is the only antidote to shame.
"True humility is the only antidote to shame."
You are stronger and wiser and freer than you have ever been.
"You are stronger and wiser and freer than you have ever been."
You have to try every time. You can't quit because you're afraid you might fail.
"You have to try every time. You can't quit because you're afraid you might fail."
